description: Yo bebo jugo de naranja todos los días.
engDescription: I drink orange juice every day.

description: El cielo está azul hoy.
engDescription: The sky is blue today.

description: Me gusta llevar una camiseta roja.
engDescription: I like to wear a red shirt.

description: Los árboles son verdes en primavera.
engDescription: The trees are green in spring.

description: El sol brilla en un cielo amarillo.
engDescription: The sun shines in a yellow sky.

description: A ella le encantan las flores rosas.
engDescription: She loves pink flowers.

description: El vestido es un color morado hermoso.
engDescription: The dress is a beautiful purple color.

description: El mar tiene un tono turquesa en esa área.
engDescription: The sea has a turquoise hue in that area.

description: El aguacate es una fruta deliciosa y saludable.
engDescription: Avocado is a delicious and healthy fruit.

description: El plátano es una fruta popular y versátil.
engDescription: Banana is a popular and versatile fruit.

description: Las cerezas son pequeñas y dulces.
engDescription: Cherries are small and sweet.

description: Las naranjas son jugosas y llenas de vitamina C.
engDescription: Oranges are juicy and full of vitamin C.

description: La papaya es una fruta tropical deliciosa y nutritiva.
engDescription: Papaya is a delicious and nutritious tropical fruit.

description: La piña es jugosa y llena de sabor.
engDescription: Pineapple is juicy and flavorful.

description: Las fresas son pequeñas, rojas y sabrosas.
engDescription: Strawberries are small, red, and tasty.

description: La sandía es refrescante y dulce en verano.
engDescription: Watermelon is refreshing and sweet in summer.

description: El brócoli es una verdura nutritiva y deliciosa.
engDescription: Broccoli is a nutritious and delicious vegetable.

description: La col es crujiente y se usa en ensaladas y platos cocidos.
engDescription: Cabbage is crunchy and used in salads and cooked dishes.

description: Las zanahorias son dulces y ricas en betacaroteno.
engDescription: Carrots are sweet and rich in beta-carotene.

description: El ajo agrega sabor a muchos platos.
engDescription: Garlic adds flavor to many dishes.

description: Las patatas se pueden cocinar de muchas maneras diferentes.
engDescription: Potatoes can be cooked in many different ways.

description: Los tomates son jugosos y se usan en ensaladas y salsas.
engDescription: Tomatoes are juicy and used in salads and sauces.

description: La espinaca es rica en hierro y se usa en ensaladas y platos calientes.
engDescription: Spinach is rich in iron and used in salads and hot dishes.

description: La coliflor se puede comer cruda o cocida.
engDescription: Cauliflower can be eaten raw or cooked.

description: El águila es un ave majestuosa y poderosa.
engDescription: The eagle is a majestic and powerful bird.

description: El flamenco tiene un colorido plumaje y patas largas.
engDescription: The flamingo has colorful plumage and long legs.

description: El búho es conocido por su visión nocturna y silencioso vuelo.
engDescription: The owl is known for its night vision and silent flight.

description: El loro es un ave parlante y colorida.
engDescription: The parrot is a talkative and colorful bird.

description: El pavo real tiene un hermoso plumaje con colores llamativos.
engDescription: The peacock has beautiful plumage with striking colors.

description: El pingüino es un ave marina que no vuela y vive en climas fríos.
engDescription: The penguin is a flightless seabird living in cold climates.

description: El colibrí es un ave pequeña y rápida conocida por su vuelo rápido.
engDescription: he hummingbird is a small, fast bird known for its quick flight.

description: El tucán tiene un pico largo y colorido.
engDescription: The toucan has a long and colorful beak.

description: El gato es un animal doméstico popular y cariñoso.
engDescription: The cat is a popular and affectionate domestic animal.

description: El ciervo tiene cuernos y es conocido por su agilidad.
engDescription: The deer has antlers and is known for its agility.

description: El perro es el mejor amigo del hombre y una mascota leal.
engDescription: The dog is man's best friend and a loyal pet.

description: El zorro tiene un pelaje rojizo y es astuto.
engDescription: The fox has a reddish fur and is cunning.

description: El leopardo tiene manchas y es un gran cazador.
engDescription: The leopard has spots and is a great hunter.

description: El panda es un animal tierno y come bambú.
engDescription: The panda is a cute animal and eats bamboo.

description: La ardilla es pequeña y tiene una cola peluda.
engDescription: The squirrel is small and has a furry tail.

description: La tortuga tiene un caparazón y vive en el agua y en tierra.
engDescription: The turtle has a shell and lives in water and on land.

description: Hablo español.
engDescription: I speak Spanish

description: Hablé con él ayer.
engDescription: I talked to him yesterday.

description: Hablaba todos los días.
engDescription: He spoke every day.

description: Hablaré contigo más tarde.
engDescription: Talk to you later.

description: He hablado con ellos.
engDescription: I have talked with them.

description: El gato está en la casa.
engDescription: The cat is in the house.

description: La mesa es grande.
engDescription: The table is big.

description: Un perro ladra fuerte.
engDescription: A dog barks loudly.

description: Una casa blanca.
engDescription: A white house.

description: Los hombres
engDescription: The men
